channel.title: Allison Janney on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Benedict Cumberbatch Calls ‘The Roses’ a “Date Night Film” Despite Its Dark Themes
item.description: Jay Roach, the director, also praises the ‘Doctor Strange’ actor’s comedic talent, telling THR: “I don’t think people expect him to be that funny, and he’s freaking hilarious.”

item.title: Benedict Cumberbatch Calls ‘The Roses’ a “Date Night Film” Despite Its Dark Themes
item.description: Jay Roach, the director, also praises the ‘Doctor Strange’ actor’s comedic talent, telling THR: “I don’t think people expect him to be that funny, and he’s freaking hilarious.”

item.title: ‘The Roses’ Review: Benedict Cumberbatch and Olivia Colman Are Sublimely Acerbic Even if the Marital Comedy Pales Next to the Original
item.description: Andy Samberg, Kate McKinnon and Allison Janney also star in Jay Roach’s reimagining of ‘The War of the Roses,’ the novel about spousal warfare and its 1989 film adaptation.

item.title: ‘The Roses’ Review: Benedict Cumberbatch and Olivia Colman Are Sublimely Acerbic Even if the Marital Comedy Pales Next to the Original
item.description: Andy Samberg, Kate McKinnon and Allison Janney also star in Jay Roach’s reimagining of ‘The War of the Roses,’ the novel about spousal warfare and its 1989 film adaptation.

item.title: ‘The Diplomat’ Sets Season 3 Release Date as Latest Teaser Sees Keri Russell Warn of “Terribly Flawed” New POTUS
item.description: Netflix offers more of a glimpse into the next episodes of the political thriller, which has added Bradley Whitford as the husband of Allison Janney’s Grace Penn.

item.title: The Atlantic Festival Adds ‘The Diplomat’ Season 3 First Look and Panels With Tom Hanks, Sterlin Harjo (Exclusive)
item.description: The September event, coming to New York for the first time, will also include panel discussions with Robert Downey Jr., David Letterman and Richard Ayoade.
